item.title: 2. Q & A
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_accordion style="2" active_tab="false" collapsible="yes"][vc_accordion_tab title="How to add Google map?"][vc_column_text]Google Map shortcode simplifies the process of Google map HTML code embedding. Click on the Map widget in Visual Composer Visit Google maps to create your map.
  1. Find location;
  2. Click âShareâ and make sure map is public on the web;
  3. Click folder icon to reveal âEmbed on my siteâ link;
  4. Copy iframe code and paste it in Map embed iframe field in the widget.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="How to remove blinking fullscreen background in wide layout?"][vc_column_text]Please follow Theme Options -> General -> Appearance -> Layout -> Background under the box -> Remove an image -> Save[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="How to add iconfont icons to the main menu?"][vc_column_text]Icons can be assigned via Appearance -> Menus -> Click on a single menu item -> âIconâ property.[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="How to make the site narrower or wider?"][vc_column_text]Please follow Theme Options -> General -> Appearance -> Layout -> Content width -> Enter the desired site width in pixels or percentages -> Save[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="How to disable breadcrumbs?"][vc_column_text]Please follow Theme Options -> Page titles -> Breadcrumbs -> Disable -> Save[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="How many slideshows am I able to create?"][vc_column_text]You are able to create as many slideshows as you want and use them on any page or post.[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="What cache plugin do you suggest to use?"][vc_column_text]We would like to advise you to install W3 Total Cache plugin.[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="Can I use Widgets in Visual Composer?"][vc_column_text]Yes, you can ad widget areas with the help of Widgetised Sidebar shortcode.[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="How to change the number of columns in footer?"][vc_column_text]Please follow Theme Options -> General -> Footer & Bottom Bar -> Footer -> Footer Layout -> Layout -> Enter the desired footer structure, f.e. 1/2+1/4+1/4 -> Save[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="How can I activate Slider Revolution?"][vc_column_text]The notice about Slider Revolution registration is a suggestion, not a requirement. The plugin is registered on Dream-Theme, and buyers of this theme do not need to register it once again. So, for now, could you please simply disregard the notice.[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="How to remove a gap between slideshow and content?"][vc_column_text]There are 50px gaps between header and content area, content area and footer. You can add negative top and bottom margins (-50) in Visual Composer row setting to remove these gaps.[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="Submit your question!"][vc_empty_space height="10px"][dt_contact_form fields="name,email,message" message_height="6" required="message" button_title="Submit question" button_size="medium"][/vc_accordion_tab][/vc_accordion][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Woo shortcodes
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Theme was tested with following shortcodes:
  1. List of categories
  2. Featured products
  3. Sale products
  4. Recent products
  5. Top rated products
  6. Best selling products
  7. Products from categories
  8. Product attribute
  9. Products by ID or SKU
  10. Single product by SKU or ID
  11. Product page by SKU or ID

item.title: Q & A
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_accordion style="2" active_tab="false" collapsible="yes"][vc_accordion_tab title="How to add Google map?"][vc_column_text]Google Map shortcode simplifies the process of Google map HTML code embedding. Click on the Map widget in Visual Composer Visit Google maps to create your map.
  1. Find location;
  2. Click âShareâ and make sure map is public on the web;
  3. Click folder icon to reveal âEmbed on my siteâ link;
  4. Copy iframe code and paste it in Map embed iframe field in the widget.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="How to remove blinking fullscreen background in wide layout?"][vc_column_text]Please follow Theme Options -> General -> Appearance -> Layout -> Background under the box -> Remove an image -> Save[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="How to add iconfont icons to the main menu?"][vc_column_text]Icons can be assigned via Appearance -> Menus -> Click on a single menu item -> âIconâ property.[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="How to make the site narrower or wider?"][vc_column_text]Please follow Theme Options -> General -> Appearance -> Layout -> Content width -> Enter the desired site width in pixels or percentages -> Save[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="How to disable breadcrumbs?"][vc_column_text]Please follow Theme Options -> Page titles -> Breadcrumbs -> Disable -> Save[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="How many slideshows am I able to create?"][vc_column_text]You are able to create as many slideshows as you want and use them on any page or post.[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="What cache plugin do you suggest to use?"][vc_column_text]We would like to advise you to install W3 Total Cache plugin.[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="Can I use Widgets in Visual Composer?"][vc_column_text]Yes, you can ad widget areas with the help of Widgetised Sidebar shortcode.[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="How to change the number of columns in footer?"][vc_column_text]Please follow Theme Options -> General -> Footer & Bottom Bar -> Footer -> Footer Layout -> Layout -> Enter the desired footer structure, f.e. 1/2+1/4+1/4 -> Save[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="How can I activate Slider Revolution?"][vc_column_text]The notice about Slider Revolution registration is a suggestion, not a requirement. The plugin is registered on Dream-Theme, and buyers of this theme do not need to register it once again. So, for now, could you please simply disregard the notice.[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="How to remove a gap between slideshow and content?"][vc_column_text]There are 50px gaps between header and content area, content area and footer. You can add negative top and bottom margins (-50) in Visual Composer row setting to remove these gaps.[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="Submit your question!"][vc_empty_space height="10px"][dt_contact_form fields="name,email,message" message_height="6" required="message" button_title="Submit question" button_size="medium"][/vc_accordion_tab][/vc_accordion][/vc_column][/vc_row]

[vc_row margin_top="0" margin_bottom="-50" padding_left="0" padding_right="0" bg_position="top" bg_repeat="no-repeat" bg_cover="false" bg_attachment="false" padding_top="0" padding_bottom="0" parallax_speed="0.1"][vc_column width="1/1" offset="vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12"][vc_column_text]

We are usually asked about:

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="22px"][vc_accordion style="3" active_tab="false" collapsible="yes"][vc_accordion_tab title="How to add Google map?"][vc_column_text]Google Map shortcode simplifies the process of Google map HTML code embedding. Click on the Map widget in Visual Composer Visit Google maps to create your map.
  1. Find location;
  2. Click âShareâ and make sure map is public on the web;
  3. Click folder icon to reveal âEmbed on my siteâ link;
  4. Copy iframe code and paste it in Map embed iframe field in the widget.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="How to remove blinking fullscreen background in wide layout?"][vc_column_text]Please follow Theme Options -> General -> Appearance -> Layout -> Background under the box -> Remove an image -> Save[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="How to add iconfont icons to the main menu?"][vc_column_text]Icons can be assigned via Appearance -> Menus -> Click on a single menu item -> âIconâ property.[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="How to make the site narrower or wider?"][vc_column_text]Please follow Theme Options -> General -> Appearance -> Layout -> Content width -> Enter the desired site width in pixels or percentages -> Save[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="How to disable breadcrumbs?"][vc_column_text]Please follow Theme Options -> Page titles -> Breadcrumbs -> Disable -> Save[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="How many slideshows am I able to create?"][vc_column_text]You are able to create as many slideshows as you want and use them on any page or post.[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="What cache plugin do you suggest to use?"][vc_column_text]We would like to advise you to install W3 Total Cache plugin.[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="Can I use Widgets in Visual Composer?"][vc_column_text]Yes, you can ad widget areas with the help of Widgetised Sidebar shortcode.[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="How to change the number of columns in footer?"][vc_column_text]Please follow Theme Options -> General -> Footer & Bottom Bar -> Footer -> Footer Layout -> Layout -> Enter the desired footer structure, f.e. 1/2+1/4+1/4 -> Save[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="How can I activate Slider Revolution?"][vc_column_text]The notice about Slider Revolution registration is a suggestion, not a requirement. The plugin is registered on Dream-Theme, and buyers of this theme do not need to register it once again. So, for now, could you please simply disregard the notice.[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="How to remove a gap between slideshow and content?"][vc_column_text]There are 50px gaps between header and content area, content area and footer. You can add negative top and bottom margins (-50) in Visual Composer row setting to remove these gaps.[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][/vc_accordion][vc_empty_space height="50px"][vc_column_text]

Didn't find the answer?

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="18px"][vc_column_text]Morbi ut mauris non ligula euismod dignissim ac ut orci. Nulla sodales tempus turpis, non interdum orci gravida eget.
